title: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] Unable to open file in another editor if already opened in one editor (should display warning)
description: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] If a file is already opened in one editor, users are unable to open it in another editor. However, a warning should be displayed.
OB: When a file is already opened in one editor, users are unable to open it in another editor.
EB: However, a warning should be displayed when attempting to open a file that is already opened in one editor.
SR:
1. Open a file in one editor
2. Attempt to open the same file in another editor
3. Verify that a warning is displayed, informing the user that the file is already opened in another editor
